/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. Overhead, power lines crisscross, forming an intricate web against the backdrop of the sky.

On the right side of the street, buildings rise, their facades a mix of architectural styles that hint at the city's rich history and modern development. On the left side, cars are parked neatly along the curb, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's blend of nature, architecture, and transportation.
